DOC.brief_summary: This is a bi-centric, prospective, open study comparing the effects of linagliptin on active GLP-1 concentrations in subjects with renal impairment compared to subjects with normal renal function.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Linagliptin on Active GLP-1 Concentrations in Subjects With Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Have Type 2 diabetes mellitus based on the disease diagnostic criteria (WHO) classification Subjects with type 1 diabetes, maturity onset diabetes of the young (MODY) or secondary forms of diabetes such as due to pancreatitis.
